original dialog info.summary: Mr. Smith's getting a check-up, and Doctor Hawkins advises him to have one every year. Hawkins'll give some information about their classes and medications to help Mr. Smith quit smoking.

log.user utterance: Hi, Mr. Smith. I'm Doctor Hawkins. Why are you here today?
log.system response: I found it would be a good idea to get a check-up.

log.user utterance: Yes, well, you haven't had one for 5 years. You should have one every year.
log.system response: I know. I figure as long as there is nothing wrong, why go see the doctor?
log.dialog history: <USER> Hi, Mr. Smith. I'm Doctor Hawkins. Why are you here today? <SYSTEM> I found it would be a good idea to get a check-up.

log.user utterance: Well, the best way to avoid serious illnesses is to find out about them early. So try to come at least once a year for your own good.
log.system response: Ok.
log.dialog history: <USER> Hi, Mr. Smith. I'm Doctor Hawkins. Why are you here today? <SYSTEM> I found it would be a good idea to get a check-up. <USER> Yes, well, you haven't had one for 5 years. You should have one every year. <SYSTEM> I know. I figure as long as there is nothing wrong, why go see the doctor?

log.user utterance: Let me see here. Your eyes and ears look fine. Take a deep breath, please. Do you smoke, Mr. Smith?
log.system response: Yes.

original dialog info.summary: Mrs Parker takes Ricky for his vaccines. Dr. Peters checks the record and then gives Ricky a vaccine.

log.user utterance: Hello Mrs. Parker, how have you been?
log.system response: Hello Dr. Peters. Just fine thank you. Ricky and I are here for his vaccines.

log.user utterance: Very well. Let's see, according to his vaccination record, Ricky has received his Polio, Tetanus and Hepatitis B shots. He is 14 months old, so he is due for Hepatitis A, Chickenpox and Measles shots.
log.system response: What about Rubella and Mumps?
log.dialog history: <USER> Hello Mrs. Parker, how have you been? <SYSTEM> Hello Dr. Peters. Just fine thank you. Ricky and I are here for his vaccines.

log.user utterance: Well, I can only give him these for now, and after a couple of weeks I can administer the rest.
log.system response: OK, great. Doctor, I think I also may need a Tetanus booster. Last time I got it was maybe fifteen years ago!

Let's see, according to his vaccination record, Ricky has received his Polio, Tetanus and Hepatitis B shots. He is 14 months old, so he is due for Hepatitis A, Chickenpox and Measles shots. <SYSTEM> What about Rubella and Mumps?

original dialog info.summary: #Person1#'s looking for a set of keys and asks for #Person2#'s help to find them.

log.user utterance: Excuse me, did you see a set of keys?
log.system response: What kind of keys?

log.user utterance: Five keys and a small foot ornament.
log.system response: What a shame! I didn't see them.
log.dialog history: <USER> Excuse me, did you see a set of keys? <SYSTEM> What kind of keys?

log.user utterance: Well, can you help me look for it? That's my first time here.
log.system response: Sure. It's my pleasure. I'd like to help you look for the missing keys.

log.user utterance: It's very kind of you.

original dialog info.summary: #Person1#'s angry because #Person2# didn't tell #Person1# that #Person2# had a girlfriend and would marry her.

log.user utterance: Why didn't you tell me you had a girlfriend?
log.system response: Sorry, I thought you knew.

log.user utterance: But you should tell me you were in love with her.
log.system response: Didn't I?
log.dialog history: <USER> Why didn't you tell me you had a girlfriend? <SYSTEM> Sorry, I thought you knew.

log.user utterance: You know you didn't.
log.system response: Well, I am telling you now.
log.dialog history: <USER> Why didn't you tell me you had a girlfriend? <SYSTEM> Sorry, I thought you knew. <USER> But you should tell me you were in love with her. <SYSTEM> Didn't I?

log.user utterance: Yes, but you might have told me before.
log.system response: I didn't think you would be interested.
log.dialog history: <USER> Why didn't you tell me you had a girlfriend? <SYSTEM> Sorry, I thought you knew. <USER> But you should tell me you were in love with her. <SYSTEM> Didn't I? <USER> You know you didn't. <SYSTEM> Well, I am telling you now.

log.user utterance: You can't be serious. How dare you not tell me you are going to marry her?
log.system response: Sorry, I didn't think it mattered.

original dialog info.summary: Malik invites Nikki to dance. Nikki agrees if Malik doesn't mind getting his feet stepped on.

log.user utterance: Watsup, ladies! Y'll looking'fine tonight. May I have this dance?
log.system response: He's cute! He looks like Tiger Woods! But, I can't dance. . .

log.user utterance: It's all good. I'll show you all the right moves. My name's Malik.
log.system response: Nice to meet you. I'm Wen, and this is Nikki.
